General.Name: Cultural Investment Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Cultural Investment Holdings Co.,Ltd engages in the film and television, and games businesses in China. It is involved in the production and sales of film and television dramas; and film screening, theater distribution, and film publicity and promotion activities. The company also engages in the planning consultation for the development of local cultural industries; cultural enterprise investment and IP resource introduction activities; operation and development of cultural industry parks; and cultural and entertainment brokerage, artist brokerage, and model brokerage activities. In addition, it offers advertising services; and publishes games. The company was formerly known as Song Liao Automotive Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Cultural Investment Holdings Co.,Ltd in April 2016. Cultural Investment Holdings Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China.
